info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern El Paso County through 615 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Calhan, or 29 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving east at 15 mph. Plowable hail is expected with these storms. Enhanced streamflow is expected due to heavy rainfall. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Calhan around 510 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
